cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on September 14, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8446, Global Food Security Reauthorization Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 120 (Wednesday, July 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. McCOLLUM:
H.R. 8446.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution
[Page H6923]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Global Food Security Reauthorization Act of 2022
